title: New Funding Alert
description: AIT Lab got awarded a MnDOT project 'Refining the Understanding of Parking Space Requirements and Its Impact on Vehicle Miles Travelled.' TXST Budget: $50,000. TXST will work with Michigan State University (MSU) as a sub-contractor! PI: Kakan Dey, Co-PI: Subasish Das.

title: New Funding Alert
description: AIT Lab is awarded with 'NCHRP Synthesis 20-05/Topic 56-05: Traffic Analysis Practices for Non-Motorized Modes (Vulnerable Road Users).' Budget: $55,000. PI: Subasish Das.

title: Student Achievement
description: AIT Lab's first Ph.D. student Jinli Liu became Dr. Jinli Liu with a Ph.D. in Geographic Information Science. Congrats!

title: Student Achievement
description: Syed Aaqib Javed and Rohit Chakraborty got Spring 2025 Thesis Fellowship individually. Congrats!

title: Student Achievement
description: Rohit Chakraborty and AIT Lab's third Ph.D. student Shriyank Somvanshi are awarded with 2024 CASITE Scholarship individually. Congrats!

title: Student Achievement
description: Undergraduate research assistant Khaled Aly Abousabaa got his B.S. in Civil Engineering. Congrats!

title: Student Achievement
description: Graduate research assistant Michael J Starewich got his M.S. in Mathematics. Congrats!

title: Student Achievement
description: Mahmuda Sultana Mimi has received a scholarship from ASHE CTX. Congrats!

title: New Paper Published
description: Revealing Equity Gaps in Pedestrian Crash Data Through Explainable Artificial Intelligence Clustering - Jinli Liu, Shriyank Somvanshi, Gian Antariksa

title: New Paper Published
description: Demographic Risk Factors and Injury Severity Scores in Substance-use Behaviour related Traffic Crashes - Mimi, Mahmuda Sultana

title: New Paper Published
description: A Survey on Kolmogorov-Arnold Network - Shriyank Somvanshi, Syed Aaqib Javed, Md Monzurul Islam, Diwas Pandit, Subasish Das

title: New Paper Published
description: A Survey on Deep Tabular Learning - Shriyank Somvanshi, Subasish Das, Syed Aaqib Javed, Gian Antariksa, Ahmed Hossain
